summary.span: 表示用來指定 Windows 資料流安全性設定的繫結項目。

span.span: Represents the binding element used to specify Windows stream security settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks TCP 和具名管道這類使用資料流導向通訊協定的傳輸，支援資料流傳輸升級。Transports that use a stream-oriented protocol such as TCP and named pipes support stream-based transport upgrades. 具體來說，WCF 會提供安全性升級。Specifically, WCF provides security upgrades. 此傳輸安全性的組態是由此類別和 所封裝，對此您可加以設定並新增至自訂繫結。The configuration of this transport security is encapsulated by this class as well as by , which can be configured and added to a custom binding. 除此之外，協力廠商可撰寫其自訂 `StreamSecurityBindingElement`。In addition, a third party can write its own custom `StreamSecurityBindingElement`. 這些繫結項目會針對建置用戶端和伺服器的資料流升級提供者所呼叫的 類別加以擴充。These binding elements extend the class that is called to build the client and server stream upgrade providers. 自訂繫結包含以特定順序排列的繫結項目之集合：第一個會新增代表繫結堆疊頂端的項目，第二個新增繫結堆疊中次一項目，依此類推。A custom binding contains a collection of binding elements arranged in a specific order: the element representing the top of the binding stack is added first, the next element down in the binding stack is added second, and so on. ### 若要將這個類別加入至繫結To add this class to a binding 1. 建立 。Create a . 2. 建立在繫結堆疊中位於此繫結項目上方任何必要的自訂繫結項目，例如選擇性的 和 。Create any required custom binding elements that are above this binding element in the binding stack, such as the optional and . 3. 依先前所述的順序，使用 方法將這些建立的項目加入至 。Add the created elements in the order described previously to the using the method. 4. 建立 的執行個體，並將它新增至集合。Create an instance of and add it to the collection. 5. 將其他任何自訂繫結項目新增至集合中，例如 。Add any additional custom binding elements to the collection, such as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會接收繫結內容當做輸入參數，該參數表示繫結項目的堆疊。This method receives a binding context as an input parameter, which represents the stack of binding elements. 這個方法會直接取得指定的物件、將查詢委派給堆疊中下一個較低層的繫結項目，或是結合這兩者。This method gets the specified object directly, delegates the inquiry to the next-lower binding element in the stack, or a combination of the two. 如果它委派查詢，它就可以修改內容。It can modify the context if it delegates the inquiry. 堆疊中的每一個繫結項目都可以重複此程序 (如果已獲得委派)，一直到堆疊的底部。Each binding element in the stack can repeat this process, if it has been delegated to, until the bottom of the stack is reached. 傳回的物件通常是屬性的集合。The object returned is usually a collection of properties. 如果 `T` 的型別為 ，則會使用 傳回這個類別的執行個體。If the type of `T` is , then an instance of this class is returned with , 和 全部設為 `true`，而 和 則設為這個繫結的目前值。, and all set to `true`, and and set to the current value in this binding. 如果 `T` 的型別為 ，則會傳回此類別的預設執行個體。If the type of `T` is , then a default instance of this class is returned. 這個方法會由繫結項目以及執行階段物件 (如 、 和 ) 所實作。This method is implemented by binding elements as well as by the run-time objects such as , , and .

summary.span: 匯出 Windows 資料流安全性的自訂原則判斷提示。

span.span: Exports a custom policy assertion about Windows stream security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將繫結相關陳述式寫入至特定合約所公開的 WSDL 資訊，並會由 WCF 用戶端進行通訊的繫結堆疊中的這個自訂繫結項目存在。This method writes binding-related statements into the WSDL information exposed by a particular contract and is used by WCF to communicate to clients the existence of this custom binding element in the binding stack. 這個方法採用兩個參數： 和 物件。This method takes two parameters: the and objects. 您可以使用 、 和 方法，取得已經在各種範圍匯出的原則判斷提示的集合。Use the , , and methods to obtain collections of policy assertions that have already been exported at various scopes. 接著使用這個方法將您自己的原則判斷提示新增至適當的集合中。Then use this method to add your own policy assertions to the appropriate collection. 屬性會公開正在匯出的端點的 。The property exposes the for the endpoint that is being exported. 這可讓這個方法正確限定其匯出原則判斷提示的範圍。This enables this method to correctly scope their exported policy assertions. 例如，程式碼中的安全性屬性可能會將行為新增至 ，指出應在何處新增安全性原則判斷提示。For example, security attributes in code can add behaviors to the that indicate where security policy assertions should be added. 在自訂原則判斷提示附加至 WSDL 資訊之後，用戶端就可以實作 介面來偵測及匯入自訂繫結判斷提示。Once custom policy assertions are attached to the WSDL information, clients can detect and import the custom binding assertions by implementing an interface.
